Property Detail

createLink

java.lang.Object createLink
Creates a anchor for a link of the given name. Other than 'action' all other attributes passed are added to the anchor tag.
attr:
action REQUIRED the action to use for creating the link.
throws:
NullPointerException if the action attribute is missing.

ifAuthorized

java.lang.Object ifAuthorized
Executes the body of the tag is the user is authorized to access a controller or action (optional)
attr:
controller OPTIONAL the name of the controller to check. If not given then the current controller is used.
attr:
action OPTIONAL the name of the action to check. If not given the current action is used.

ifLoggedIn

java.lang.Object ifLoggedIn
Executes the body of the tag is the user is logged in.

ifNotAuthorized

java.lang.Object ifNotAuthorized
Executes the body of the tag is the user IS NOT authorized to access a controller or action (optional)
attr:
controller OPTIONAL the name of the controller to check. If not given then the current controller is used.
attr:
action OPTIONAL the name of the action to check. If not given the current action is used.

ifNotLoggedIn

java.lang.Object ifNotLoggedIn
Executes the body of the tag is the user is not logged in.

namespace

static java.lang.Object namespace

java.lang.Object sharedSecurityService
